title: ProtoArray: Best node is not viable for head
body:
I upgraded to Teku v21.3.2 at Mar 25 23:27:59. On Mar 26 I noticed an unusually high number of missed attestations as well as Exceptions. Rolling back to v21.3.0 seems to have resolved the issues.

This is an example Exception:

java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.RuntimeException: ProtoArray: Best node is not viable for head
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeRelay(CompletableFuture.java:367) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeRelay(CompletableFuture.java:376) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniRelay.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1019) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:506) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeExceptionally(CompletableFuture.java:2088) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateResult$3(SafeFuture.java:142) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-2>
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:859) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenCompleteStage(CompletableFuture.java:883) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:2251) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:501) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar:21>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:29) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar:21.>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.propagateResult(SafeFuture.java:139) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.propagateTo(SafeFuture.java:236) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar:21.>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$createRunnableForAction$1(ScheduledExecutorAsyncRu>
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:834) [?:?]
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: ProtoArray: Best node is not viable for head
        at tech.pegasys.teku.protoarray.ProtoArray.findHead(ProtoArray.java:175) ~[teku-protoarray-21.3.2.jar:21.3.2]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.protoarray.ForkChoiceStrategy.findHead(ForkChoiceStrategy.java:94) ~[teku-protoarray-21.3.2.jar:21.3.2]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.ForkChoice.findNewChainHead(ForkChoice.java:254) ~[teku-ethereum-statetransition>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.ForkChoice.updateForkChoiceForImportedBlock(ForkChoice.java:225) ~[teku-ethereum>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.ForkChoice.lambda$onBlock$4(ForkChoice.java:197) ~[teku-ethereum-statetransition>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.eventthread.AsyncRunnerEventThread.recordEventThreadIdAndExecute(AsyncRunnerEventThrea>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.eventthread.AsyncRunnerEventThread.lambda$doExecute$1(AsyncRunnerEventThread.java:92) >
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:78) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar:21.3.2]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.AsyncRunner.lambda$runAsync$2(AsyncRunner.java:38) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.>
        at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:70) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-21.3.2.jar:21.3.2]
        ... 4 more

* Teku version: teku/v21.3.2/linux-x86_64/-ubuntu-openjdk64bitservervm-java-11
* Java version: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.10+9-Ubuntu-0ubuntu1.20.04, mixed mode, sharing)
* Distro: Ubuntu 20.04
* Kernel: 5.8.0-48-generic #54~20.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Sat Mar 20 13:40:25 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
